TestGroupDocumentation.Title: minExclusive4 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a minExclusive-4.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a negativeInteger restricted SimpleType with minExclusive value -88651049463528008854.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML negativeInteger minExclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minExclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value -88651049463528008853 for the negativeInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-negativeInteger-minExclusive-4 element, sets the values: -88651049463528008853, -8865104946352800885, -1 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML negativeInteger minExclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minExclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value -88651049463528008853 for the negativeInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-negativeInteger-minExclusive-4 element, sets the values: -886510494635280088530, -88651049463528008854, 0, 88651049463528008854 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML negativeInteger minExclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of negativeInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-negativeInteger-minExclusive-4 type, sets the values: -88651049463528008853, -8865104946352800885, -1 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML negativeInteger minExclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of negativeInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-negativeInteger-minExclusive-4 type, sets the values: -886510494635280088530, -88651049463528008854, 0, 88651049463528008854 and expects validation to fail.
